name: Melanesian Music
description: Music of the Oceanian region of Melanesia.

children.name: Kaneka
children.description: New Caledonian style of popular music that draws influence from traditional Melanesian music.

children.name: Lokal musik
children.description: Created by local, rural artists from Papua New Guinea that incorporate some elements of Papuan Folk Music into Pop.

children.name: Papuan Folk Music
children.description: Traditional Folk Music of the Papuan people of New Guinea.

children.name: Tolai Rock
children.description: Fuses the music of the Tolai people of Papua New Guinea with Rock.
